data.title: DWR Awards $22 Million to Address Drought Impacts and Support Small Communities Statewide
data.excerpt: Following the driest three-month stretch in the state’s recorded history and with warmer months ahead, the Department of Water Resources (DWR) announced its seventh round of grant awards for local assistance through the Small Community Drought Relief program.
data.author: Anna Opalka
